name: Key To Dance
description:
A brand new 9K Rhythm Game, this was a small project i did, although it took me a very long time and i have high hopes for it!


The game was made during a burnout of making my main game for steam, it was suppose to take a week or less but instead i went full on and it took me a month or even more to make. I put a lot of work and time into this game and i really like how it turned out.



Custom Map support is in game and they are very easy to make and import it just creates a folder in wich it creates the audio file the data file and you can even add a cover (optional).




The gameplay itself is hard to read so good luck with that haha, no but really i tried to make this as readable as possible, didint turn out great but it is still really fun! It was really hard to think of a better way so if you have any suggestions join the discord!




I have created a discord server where you can share or request your beatmaps! You can also have a great time, follow the game updates, discuss about the game, make petitions of what you would want to be in the game and just discuss about the game!
https://discord.gg/C7BAanBSkK

Have Fun!
